CustomField.description: Round Robin ID to route cases. The CASE formula supports different integer processes for each record type
CustomField.formula: CASE( RecordType.Name , "Billing", MOD(VALUE( CaseNumber ) ,5) +1, "Support", MOD(VALUE( CaseNumber ) ,5) +1, "Subscription Review", MOD(VALUE( CaseNumber ) ,6) +1,0)
CustomField.label: Round Robin ID
